mapper.select: SELECT b.boomk_update_date ,b.user_id ,b.boomk_facility_cd ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_address ,f.facility_detail_addr ,f.facility_tell FROM boomk_facility AS b INNER JOIN facility AS f ON b.facility_cd = f.facility_cd WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.boomk_facility_state = 'Y';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boomk_facility( boomk_facility_cd, facility_cd, user_id, boomk_reg_date, boomk_facility_state, boomk_update_date )VALUES ( sf_new_boomk_facility_cd(), #{facilityCd}, #{userId}, NOW(), 'Y', NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM boomk_facility WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND facility_cd = #{facilityCd};
mapper.update: UPDATE boomk_facility SET boomk_facility_state = 'N', boomk_update_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND facility_cd = #{facilityCd};
UPDATE boomk_facility SET boomk_facility_state = 'Y', boomk_update_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND facility_cd = #{facilityCd};
mapper.select: /*시설전체조회*/ SELECT facility_cd as facilityCd ,main_ctg_cd as mainCtgCd ,area_cd as areaCd ,city_cd as cityCd ,town_cd as townCd ,facility_use_cd as facilityUseCd ,user_id as userId ,facility_nm as facilityNm ,facility_address as facilityAddr ,facility_tell as facilityTell ,facility_post_num as facilityPostNum ,business_number as businessNum ,facility_reg_date as facilityRegDate FROM facility
